text:
Chapter 7
How to Develop MLPs for Time Series
Forecasting
Multilayer Perceptrons, or MLPs for short, can be applied to time series forecasting. A challenge
with using MLPs for time series forecasting is in the preparation of the data. Speciﬁcally, lag
observations must be ﬂattened into feature vectors. In this tutorial, you will discover how to
develop a suite of MLP models for a range of standard time series forecasting problems. The
